moreBlocks.articles:
• Bankruptcy
    The attorneys at the Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl have more than 25 years of experience representing individual and business debtors in connection with bankruptcy.
  • Chapter 7 Bankruptcy
    Chapter 7 bankruptcy, often called a liquidation or straight bankruptcy, is the most common type of bankruptcy proceeding.
  • Chapter 11
    Contact our Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Maryland Attorney.
  • Chapter 13 Bankruptcy
    Chapter 13 Bankruptcy is a way for people to "reorganize" their debt into a manageable, monthly payment plan that is fair for the individual's creditors.
  • Tax Controversy
    We provide aggressive, experienced legal representation before the Internal Revenue Service and state tax agencies for audits, IRS collection matters, criminal investigations, and tax court litigation.

description:
Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl, LLC, provides skilled representation for bankruptcy, bankruptcy litigation and tax litigation concerns. In addition, we offer representation for personal injury claims, estate planning and administration, business organizations & transactions, and criminal defense. Based in Lutherville-Timonium, Maryland, our law firm serves clients in Baltimore city, Harford, Carroll, Baltimore County and Howard County through our six convenient locations.

Our bankruptcy and bankruptcy litigation practice includes both personal bankruptcy, through Chapter 7 or 13, and business bankruptcy, through Chapter 11. We also provide aggressive, experienced legal representation before the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) and state tax agencies for audits, IRS collection matters, criminal investigations, and tax court litigation.

Attorney Robert Stahl has more than 20 years of legal experience, as well as more than 30 years as a certified public accountant (CPA), allowing him to skillfully lead our legal team in the successful resolution of our clients' debt and tax issues. Our firm has been helping individual and business debtors with bankruptcy and tax concerns since 1983. We are dedicated to helping clients achieve the best possible outcome and a future free of overwhelming financial and tax debt.

Contact the Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl, LLC, today to schedule a free initial consultation regarding your bankruptcy or tax matter. Evening and weekend appointments are available at our law firm upon request. All major credit cards are accepted.
